description: A gang of high school delinquents discover that the man they assaulted was the father of Jamie, one of their gang members. When Jamie learns the truth about the incident, he joins forces with the 'good' students to combat juvenile delinquency. A social guidance film intended to trigger classroom discussion in American school students.
